locations.name: Hanalei
locations.description: Base for exploring Kauai's North Shore, known for its stunning bay, bohemian charm, lush valleys, and proximity to the Na Pali Coast.

locations.name: Poipu
locations.description: Sunny South Shore resort area famous for its golden-sand beaches, ideal for swimming, snorkeling, and relaxation, with access to Waimea Canyon.
